name: Shipment Tracking Management System
desc: Logistic Data Management System for uploading, dispatching, and tracking logistic data, Built using ReactJs , Redux-Toolkit , MUI, Tailwind-CSS.

name: Task Management System
desc: The app facilitates group creation, and assignment distribution. Users can add new employees, create groups, and assign tasks to individuals or groups.

name: Streamlined Stock and Invoice Management for Retailers
desc: The online grocery shop project. The online grocery shopping system directly delivers products to customers' addresses
